title: Bug 115167Library UI adjustments
description: Bug 115167Library UI adjustments The name ofthe perspective is Lib Design.
OB: When you create a new library, the library perspective appears. The message shown in the new empty library is:Library currently empty, add components from the palette or the menu to thelibrary outline menu.Better wording is:This library is empty. The color of the new empty library in the editor is too dark. This colormakes it difficult to read the message.
SR: Can this use full words, instead of contractions:Library Design.2. Add components to the library outline from the palette orthe menu.3. Use a lighter gray, or even white.
